# severe-CDI

```{python}
#| output: 'asis'
import yaml
is_yaml = False
yaml_lines = list()
with open('paper/paper.qmd', 'r') as infile:
    for line in infile:
        if line.startswith('---'):
            is_yaml = not is_yaml
        elif is_yaml:
            yaml_lines.append(line)
yaml_dict = yaml.load(''.join(yaml_lines), Loader = yaml.CLoader)
print(yaml_dict['title'])
print('\n')
print(', '.join(auth['name'] for auth in yaml_dict['author']))
```
